opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Madison, Appellant.
Submitted April 15, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Ralph Madison, appellant, in propria persona.
Ralph B. D’lorio and Vram S. Nedurian, Assistant District Attorneys, William R. Toal, Jr., First Assistant District Attorney, and Stephen J. MeEwen, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
July 1, 1968:
